title: Air monitoring for California's largest remediation project
summary: Aeroqual provided air monitoring technology for the Exide Residential Cleanup project in Vernon, CA, overseen by the Department of Toxic Substances Control (DTSC). Parsons Corporation used over 40 Aeroqual Dust Sentry monitors with wind sensors to monitor PM10 in real-time and comply with South Coast AQMD regulations during the lead-contaminated soil removal from over 1,000 residential properties.
